content.query:
USE [CovidOnDemand]
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'CovidDataParquet') 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CovidDataParquet] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'silver/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [CovidData],
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
) AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'CovidData',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2
    ) WITH (
        [dateRep] varchar (10),
        [day] int,
        [month] int,
        [year] int,
        [cases] int,
        [deaths] int,
        countriesAndTerritories varchar (100),
        geoId varchar (100),
        countryterritoryCode varchar (100),
        popData2018 varchar(20),
        continentExp varchar (100)
    ) AS r;
GO

SELECT
    *
FROM
    [dbo].[CovidDataParquet]
